reference.title: ERXMISC0_EL1, Selected Error Record Miscellaneous Register 0, EL1
reference.shortdesc: Register ERXMISC0_EL1 accesses the ERR<n>MISC0 register for the error record selected by ERRSELR_EL1.SEL.

section.p: If ERRSELR_EL1.SEL==0, then ERXMISC0_EL1 accesses the ERR0MISC0 register of the core error record. See ERR0MISC0, Error Record Miscellaneous Register 0The ERR0MISC0 is an error syndrome register. It contains corrected error counters, information to identify where the error was detected, and other state information not present in the corresponding status and address error record registers..
If ERRSELR_EL1.SEL==1, then ERXMISC0_EL1 accesses the ERR1MISC0 register of the DSU error record. See the Arm DynamIQ Shared Unit Technical Reference Manual.
